sentences.sContent: He has just published his tenth novel.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has just published his tenth novel.
sentences.sCn: 他刚刚发表了他的第十本小说。

sentences.sContent: Not because she lost, in fact she just won her last election to her tenth term by a landslide.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not because she lost, in fact she just won her last election to her tenth term by a landslide.
sentences.sCn: 不只因为她的失败，事实上她只是由于占绝对优势的选举赢得第十期最后的选举。

sentences.sContent: Many already go for the second option: one-tenth of remittances to Africa come from within the continent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many already go for the second option: one-tenth of remittances to Africa come from within the continent.
sentences.sCn: 很多人已经选择第二个选择了：十分之一汇向非洲国家的汇款来自欧洲国家。

trans.tranOther: one of ten equal parts of something
one of ten equal parts of something
